text: Three days had passed but– We crashed into the soft furniture of our rental house. And slept. My body ached, in a good way, The way bodies do after adventures. Twelve hours later it was coffee and poolside sitting In the warm sun. We did that for a few hours, In and out of the pool. Then, Hey, what’s this? My friend called out from inside. A bright pink beam emanated from the television, Which was turned off. Already?
